portal 2 is a fun engaging thriller.  it is a fun puzzle game with tons of new mechanics making the impossible possible. And for any parents or teaches this teaches players while still having fun. And to prove this is a work of genius, I have played the game 30 times over and have played it for 125h. this also has a creative aspect, creating your one puzzles. Portal 2 has an amazing plot and made me think outside the box in everyday life issues and school my life. I am retying portal 2 10/10 for creativity, 9/10 for plot and 10/10 for pure fun, entertainment and creativity.

Pushing the concept of what one could imagine. pushing the bounds of what our brains as humans are capable of grasping. plus there is cake. if you dont have this game you might as well pay full price or it its a must have.

This game and its sequel are probably my favourite games I have ever played. I love everything about this game, the mechanics, the puzzles, the world design (which I would talk about in more detail but I can't because I don't know too much about the creative process for those things), the hauntingly lonely atmosphere and the chilling soundtrack all add up to create an absolutely fantastic game, if you haven't played this game, do!

没查攻略自己摸索通关了剧情，非常优秀的一款游戏。很难形容带给我的感觉，只有在游戏中才能体验的到，这或许就是游戏的魅力吧。
另外，好像有些朋友觉得很晕，我感觉还好，至少这种不适感在游玩的过程中不是很明显，可能确实因人而异吧。不过值得一提的是，本人胆子比较小，最后一关被我玩成了恐怖游戏，结束之后好一会儿没缓过来（结尾的音乐真的很好听，歌词也很棒）
игра интересная , надо бы забрать 2 часть

解密游戏里的神作。除了要动脑思考外还要考研你的反应力。本体游戏很简单，大多数人都能顺利通关，片尾BGM Still Alive很好听。而奖励地图里的高级图和挑战图才是这个游戏有难度的地方。适合喜欢挑战的玩家。

总体来说强烈推荐游玩。
отличная головоломка

TOP 60 Listem
6) 10/8.41

Portal is everything it wants to be. That makes the game a very fun and intriguing. Not perfect, but close to it. It is a very innovative puzzle game with a great sense of humour and that basically already it. It is not very long at all, you can probably finish it within one sitting. Besides the puzzles and the humour there is not much else to it, which is the only point that is somewhat negative. But it doesn't take away from the overall experience. 

Pros:
- great, fun and innovative puzzles
- great humour

Con:
- lacks a bit of depth

8/10 points

portal is a amazing game that holds up perfectly today with fun puzzles very fun mechanics and amazing voice acting from glados very funny humour although the main story is a little short even then there is more and 100% worth the asking price dont buy it on sale you will feel like you are stealing from vavle its that good
